content: green yarn to a front loop of the round 44 of the body that was the first round of the head round 1 ch3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in the next 29 st slip_stitch 30 st round 2 ch2 fpdc bpdc x 15 slip_stitch 30 st round 3 ch2 fpdc bpdc x 15 slip_stitch 30 st cut the yarn fasten_off and weave in the end bottom attach green yarn to a front loop of the round 24 of the body round 1 ch3 doesn t count as double_crochet double_crochet in the next 54 st slip_stitch 54 st round 2 ch2 fpdc bpdc x 27 slip_stitch 54 st round 3 ch2 fpdc bpdc x 27 slip_stitch 54 st cut the yarn fasten_off and weave in the end 9 10 10 11 11
